data.name: Good Bones
data.detailed_description:
In this first ever release from RETCON Games comes a haunting point-and-click mystery, where your choices matter and it's always possible to dig a little deeper for the truth.



After the death of your spouse, you pack up your daughter and run from your grief—straight into a dilapidated old house filled with terrible memories.



When you encounter the ghost of a young woman who doesn't remember who she is, why she's there, or how she died, it's up to you and your daughter to explore the house for clues to her identity, her death, and her path to moving on.



But tread carefully. Jumping to conclusions too quickly could put everything you love at risk.
data.about_the_game:
In this first ever release from RETCON Games comes a haunting point-and-click mystery, where your choices matter and it's always possible to dig a little deeper for the truth.



After the death of your spouse, you pack up your daughter and run from your grief—straight into a dilapidated old house filled with terrible memories.



When you encounter the ghost of a young woman who doesn't remember who she is, why she's there, or how she died, it's up to you and your daughter to explore the house for clues to her identity, her death, and her path to moving on.



But tread carefully. Jumping to conclusions too quickly could put everything you love at risk.
data.short_description: Your new house has old secrets in this haunting point-and-click mystery, where you'll search for clues about a mysterious death, solve narrative puzzles, and make heartbreaking choices to navigate amnesia, grief, and revenge.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 550 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 550 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
